body.name: Upgraded MP22YA 4 Pack Electric Range Burner Element Unit Set, 2 x MP15YA 6" and 2 x MP21YA 8" Stove Burners Replacement for Kenmore, Hardwick, Maytag, Norge Whirlpool Electric Range Stove
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 46 mins
features: 【High Quality & Upgraded Material Stove Burner】 The MP22YA electric stove burners replacement set are made from high temperature stainless alloys.durable to use, small temperature coefficient of resistance, low deformation at high temperature and not easy to embrittle. Fits OEM Standards and/or exceed OEM requirements by tested.

【Electric Stove Burners Elements For Whirlpool Compatibility】 These stove top burners element fit most ranges, EXEPT GE/Hotpoint. Replace part number: 484782, 9761347, 12001231, S46Y15, 5304431014, 484783, SU204, 04000034, 0045546, 0051088, 0054794, 0067069, 0071930, 3374, AP3075808, PS340571, EAP340571.

【Design】 It has a "Y" style bracket. This burner elements will not fit GE and Hotpoint, and make sure your Y bracket size match ours，otherwise this product may not fit your drip pans. If the range burner does not sit flat on your stove, make sure the connection bolts are parallel and pushed a bit down. Please check the dimensions of the stove burner as shown on the photos to ensure they fit your stove before purchasing.

【Package List】 We have a 90-day hassle-free shopping service, during which any questions can be returned or exchanged. The stove burners replacement electric set include 2pcs MP15YA Stove Burner Element-6" 1500 watt 230v 4 coils and 2pcs MP21YA Stove Burner Element -8" 2100 watt 230v 5 coils.

【Reminder】The new stove burner has a layer of protect coating on it, which is used to protect the surface. When using the item for the first time, the protect coating will volatilize with the high temperature, it maybe has a little smog, which is normal because it is caused by the protective layer of the new burner element. Customer continue to use the product for about 20 minutes, and there will be no more smoke when next time use. MP15YA specs include 6" 4 coils, MP21YA include 8" 5 coils.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LXun MP22YA Electric Range Burner Elements Unit Set, 4 Pack Included 2 x MP15YA 6" and 2 x MP21YA 8" Replacement

Design: "Y" Style Bracket It has a "Y" style bracket. This burner elements will not fit GE and Hotpoint, and make sure your Y bracket size match ours，otherwise this product may not fit your drip pans. High Quality Material The stove burner covers replacement parts are made by durable high quality material. Using Reminder For the first time use, the stove burner protect coating will volatilize with the high temperature, it maybe has a little smog, which is normal.Suggest use it about 10-15 minutes, there will be no smoke next time.
If the range burner does not sit flat on your stove, make sure the connection bolts are parallel and pushed a bit down.

Q&A 1 Package Included: A total of 4 pieces burner elements: Two large 8" 2100 watt 230 v 5 coils burner (MP21YA) And Two small 6" 1500 watt 230v 4 coils burner (MP15YA) 2 Will these fit in a GE stove? These stove top burners fit most ranges. EXEPT GE and Hotpoint,Tappan. 3 What are the stove burner element size? MP15YA Stove Burner Element-6" 1500 watt 230v 4 coils burners and MP21YA Stove Burner Element -8" 2100 watt 230v 5 coils burners. 4 Will this work for a Kenmore 790.94114402? Yes, They work with Kenmore. 5 Will this work for a Frigidaire stove top? Yes, They did. 6 Will this item work on a kenmore stove model number 91194492991? Yes, It works well. 7 Why is there smoke? When you use it for the first time, the protective silicone oil on the outer layer of the item breaks down at high temperatures, and produces a little smoke. After it is fully burned there will be no more smoke. 8 About the size There are 4 burners in the package, 2 are 6 inches and 2 are 8 inches, if your old burner size doesn't match this, please don't buy it, even if your model is listed. 9 I bought a black one, why did I receive a green one? The green color is the protective silicone oil layer on the outer layer of the item, this will burn and evaporate after use and the appearance will turn black after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable replacement coils!
reviews.reviewText: These work perfectly with my Amana stove. The old ones were falling apart when I removed them for cleaning, so I figured I might as well replace them. I was only going to replace one, but I got the entire set of 4 for the same price as some brands were charging for 1 or 2! They fit prefect and I've been using them over a month and see no difference from the originals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These words well and we're a good replacement for the money. Taking off a star because they arrived bent. They are also slightly green instead of black like I expected. The chemical smell went away after the first use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Parts work and easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit NICELY UPGRADED
reviews.reviewText: These are very well made and fit my old whirlpool coil stove perfectly. The coils are more tightly wound than the old coils therefore they heat more evenly! Wish I would've replaced my old ones sooner!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The elements appear well made. The small elements fit into the oven top wells and splash pans very well; not too much rocking around. The large elements weren't as precision as the 'rails' that suspend the element are too long and the one that should fit into the pan slot is too long and high. I had to take them to the bench grinder and remove some material so they would lay flat and not rock around. I made them work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Heat up fast and even. Happy with burners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They WORK! and They FIt my stove!
reviews.reviewText: They came brand new in a box, wrapped individually with instructions too!. Make sure you read the instructions because like it stated, it will smoke a little due to a protective coating that will burn off. I admittedly put them on and it was simple too!. They were easy to insert in the stove and works really good with my electrical stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ones that came with my stove started to smoke every time something was cooked. (Well one of them did) I only had the stove going on 6 years. I changed the drip pans first the smoke didn't stop. So I purchased these & no more smoke.
It was very easy to install and packing was Good.I had a problem with my burners for months and these came as a life saver for me.Awesome Product.
These didn’t fit our Kenmore stove top ☹️…a refund was quickly arranged 👍
